long_description: A tested and proven workhorse, Spy Logan Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with equally tough polycarbonate lenses, making them ideal for outdoor sports. Impact-resistant polycarbonate lenses with silver mirroring block 100% of harmful UV rays and reflect glare. Gilamid nylon frames stand up to impact, cracking and fatigue. Spy Logan lenses have a unique tapered shape to provide optically correct, distortion-free viewing at all angles. 8-base lenses feature a modified wrap that give you some eye protection from the sides.
short_description: A tested and proven workhorse, Spy Logan Sunglasses are built from virtually indestructible Grilamid nylon with equally tough polycarbonate lenses, making them ideal for outdoor sports.
